content: DUAN Yue | School of Computing and Information Systems | School of Computing and Information Systems showSidebars == showTitleBreadcrumbs == 1 node.field_disable_title_breadcrumbs.value == Faculty Profile School of Computing and Information Systems SCIS DUAN Yue Full-time Faculty Assistant Professor of Computer Science Research StatementFaculty Homepage Qualification PhD, University of California, 2019 Teaching Topics Foundations of Cybersecurity Research Advisor/Co-Research Advisor to DUAN Shengchen +65 68264807 yueduan@smu.edu.sg Curriculum Vitae Research Areas School of Computing and Information SystemsInformation Systems & TechnologySoftware EngineeringCybersecuritySafety, Security & FairnessSecurity & Governance of Software/AI Systems Strategic Priorities Digital Transformation
